about_the_game:
“That Time I Found A Box” is a roguelike deckbuilder where during a run you can craft and infinitely upgrade your cards. Choose carefully when to play them and when / how to upgrade them.

Discover what’s possible with deep strategic card building and deck building resulting in vanishingly rare moments of there being only one obvious play available.

Choose your allies, have some fun and create game-breaking cards!... And most importantly, be able to put the box down and get out alive.

Demo Content

  • 15 perks to change up gameplay between runs.

  • 30+ Card Effects to mix and match.

  • 15+ Tier Up Bonus options.

  • Play board with 7 different ways to play or manipulate cards (Play Spaces, the Vault, the Combiner, the Randomiser, the Duplicator, and Ascenders Persist and Split).

  • 2 phases to complete a run (third phase is only available in the Full Release)

Features

  • Innovative Card Effect System where Cards are like blank slates and Card Effects can be randomly or purposely added to Cards.

  • You control what's in your deck with many ways to get cards with card effects that you want, and remove those that you don't.

  • Survive and thrive through tactically balancing being opportunistic with upgrades and keeping everyone happy. Falling behind may hinder progress and ultimately lead to your downfall!

  • Unlock perks during runs and assign them for new runs to change up gameplay and unlock new strategies.
